episode.title: 好きな子がラブレターを拾った
The Girl I Like Picked Up a Love Letter
Suki na Ko ga Love Letter o Hirotta
episode.summary: Daily life as Mie is a challenge when she forgets her glasses so often. Thank goodness for Komura-kun! But when Mie receives a love letter, has Komura’s luck run out? Source: crunchyroll
